bot_settings.welcome_message:
👋 Hi! I'm Demo Assistant. I can answer questions about our services, pricing, and more. Try asking:

• What are your hours?
• How much does it cost?
• Can I get a demo?
bot_settings.fallback_message:
Hmm, I'm not sure about that one. But I'd love to help! You can:

1️⃣ Ask another question
2️⃣ Type 'contact' to speak with our team
3️⃣ Browse our FAQ at democompany.com/faq
